timeline.bodyHTML:
While it is amusing, doing this would cause great confusion to users that got random fonts since it would change every time the map is drawn. Instead just go for the first font on the list and hope it isn't wingdings.

Suggested change
// Preferred fonts not available... do a lucky draw
Random r = new Random();
return fonts[r.nextInt(fonts.length)];
// Preferred fonts not available... just go with the first one
return fonts[0];
